name: Qualities of a Maiden, Eriri
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Game》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "A Separate Route After 8 Years" is in your climax area, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may choose this card and 1 of your other characters, and return them to your hand."
flavorText: I'm gonna become your #1. Until then, I'm never gonna apologize.

name: Tomoya's Beloved Disciple, Izumi
text: 【CONT】 Memory If your memory has 2 or more "Little Love Rhapsody", this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each other 《Game》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I want to get better and better at my illustrations. I want people to feel moved. And... I want to beat that person.

name: Tsundere Trope Childhood Friend, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Cheap Knockoff Childhood Friends" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of "Cheap Knockoff Childhood Friends" in your waiting room. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: What are you talking about?! Are you stupid?! Don't get the wrong idea like that!

name: Nostalgic Memory, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Game》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Eriri: ""LLR" was the first game that I introduced to you."

name: Unexpected Gift, Izumi
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Game》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your memory] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Game》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Why would an artist from a famous circle draw something for me?

name: What Separates the Two, Eriri
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 0 or lower characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 During the attack phase, when your character or your opponent's character is returned to hand from the waiting room, all of that player's characters get -3 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: That's about enough of that, Utaha Kasumigaoka!

name: blessing software, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in the original order. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Are you asking me out?

name: Confronting the Past, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Little Love Rhapsody" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I won't apologize. No matter what happens, I'll never apologize to you!

name: The Morning of the Battle, Izumi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 cost 0 or lower 《Game》 character with level equal or lower than your level, put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I'm so glad!

name: Fancy Wave, Izumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Game》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Meanwhile, we're happy if we sell half of the 1-- units brought in.

name: Flustered, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 Memory When this card attacks, if you have a card in your memory, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Game》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: And acts like that in front of Tomoya, I mean, a man!

name: Critiquing the Proposal, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 "Tomoya's Proposal" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Anyway, Tomoya, your way of thinking is warped from the get-go.

name: Overflowing Talent, Izumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put this card into your memory. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Overflowing Talent, Izumi" in your memory, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Because I came up with a new story idea the day before the deadline.

name: Training Camp With Everyone, Eriri
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Game》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: And the girl characters were all super cute.

name: Prince of Otaku, Tomoya
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Game》 characters in front of this card get +500 power and +1 soul. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Tsundere Trope Childhood Friend, Eriri" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Tsundere Trope Childhood Friend, Eriri" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Come into town with me!

name: Strong Fixation, Izumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's waiting room has 3 or more climax, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: It's "Little Love Rhapsody"!

name: Who She Admired, Izumi
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +4000 power for each other "In a Tracksuit and Glasses, Eriri" in your center stage.
flavorText: Because she was the most famous person in our school district!

name: In a Tracksuit and Glasses, Eriri
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, this card gets 《Glasses》.
flavorText: So don't be so unsympathetic, okay?!

name: Little Sister Trope Kouhai, Izumi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Game》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Enemy? Ally? Or a New Character? " is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Game》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavorText: Make sure to come to Summer Comiket, no matter what!

name: Event Disguise, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Tomoya: "How about it?! It's really interesting!"

name: Sold Out for the First Time, Izumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Game》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Reliable Helpers" is in your climax area, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Game》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Thank you... Everyone...

name: Staring, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 Memory When this card attacks, if your memory has 2 or more cards, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Game》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: Tomoya: "No, not there! I'll get an—"

name: Middle Schooler Led Astray, Izumi
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each other 《Game》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Game》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Utaha: "That means she's still in middle school, right?"

name: Tomoya's Proposal
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 of your 《Game》 characters, and that character gets +3500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm dying to find out how someone would arrive at such a nonsensical, stupid, downright painful notion.

name: Little Love Rhapsody
text: Put this card into your memory. Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《Manga》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【CONT】 Memory During your turn, if this card is in your memory, all of your 《Manga》 characters get +500 power.
flavorText: Tomoya: "Do you have any idea how much you meant to me back then?!"

name: Eri Kashiwagi's LLR Autograph Board
text: If you do not have a 《Game》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and put this card into your memory. 【AUTO】 Memory [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your main phase, if this card is in your memory, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to your hand.
flavorText: Izumi: "Wow!"

name: A Separate Route After 8 Years
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand)
flavorText: Tomoya: "But I guess we haven't made up."

name: Cheap Knockoff Childhood Friends
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 yellow card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Eriri: "Ch-Cheap knockoff childhood friends..."

name: Enemy? Ally? Or a New Character?
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)
flavorText: I came back for you, Senpai!

name: Reliable Helpers
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 yellow card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Izumi: "Tomoya! You really came!"

name: Reliable Senior, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Game》 or 《Novel》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Tomoya: "Senpai... Please, make me a man!"

name: Ideal Girl, Megumi
text: 【CONT】 If there are 1 or more markers underneath this card, this card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects. If there are 2 or more markers, this card gets +1000 power. If there are 3 or more markers, all of your other characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may look at the top card of your deck. If you do, put that card face down underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend" is in your climax area, you may put that character into your opponent's clock. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, if this card is in your center stage, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Could this me become the heroine of the story you're trying to make?

name: Invading the Battlefield, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 1 or less other characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character in any position of your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may put this card into your stock. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: But at this point, I have no choice but to rely on you, a severe anime-pig.

name: Unnecessary Concern, Megumi
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play event cards or "Backup" from your hand.
flavorText: Oh, did I interrupt something?

name: No Flags Raised, Megumi
text: 【CONT】 Memory If "Ideal Girl, Megumi is in your memory, this card gets +2500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."
flavorText: What was it about me that appealed to you, Aki?

name: Dark Side of Creators, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Cost of Pulling an All-Nighter" is in your climax area, put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (You cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavorText:
The protagonist disregards the yandere
heroine, and dates another girl.

name: blessing software, Megumi
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 "Ideal Girl, Megumi" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory.
flavorText: So, what should I be doing?

name: Faint Presence, Megumi
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] When "How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Ideal Girl, Megumi" in your memory, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +4000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm totally boring.

name: Vain Resistance, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Game》 character in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
flavorText: Leave me alone! I'm telling you, I'm not going!

name: Image Change, Megumi
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Game》 character from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: When my hairstyle is criticized this bad, I may feel hurt, you know?

name: Mysterious Intimidation, Megumi
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Being Serious in Creating Games" is in your climax area, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Game》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and your opponent cannot play event cards from their hand until the end of their next turn.
flavorText: Meguri: "By the way, Seiji. I didn't buy that, you know?"

name: Anger Voltage, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may choose 1 of your other characters with "Utaha(詩羽)" in its card name, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: Utaha Kasumigaoka!

name: Insufficient Facial Expressions, Megumi
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【CONT】 This card gets +1 level and +1500 power for each marker underneath this card. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may look at the top card of your deck. If you do, put that card face down underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: I don't know what to say...

name: Advice From a Senpai, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText:
But I see you need to study how
it's done from the very basics.

name: Sudden Revelation, Tomoya
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Choose 1 "Tomoya's Proposal" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: But... I'm sorry. I can't walk you home today. There's somewhere I've got to go right away.

name: Costume Design, Eriri
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Acting Director, Utaha", all of your other 《Game》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
Megumi: "Sawamura redesigned this dress and tweaked it so it would
match your tastes precisely."

name: Acting Director, Utaha
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Costume Design, Eriri", all of your other 《Game》 or 《Novel》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 《Game》 or 《Novel》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText:
Megumi: "And my speaking style and performance were
straight from Kasumigaoka-senpai's script."

name: Mad Expression, Megumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: I don't make a face like that at all.

name: Unexpected Words, Megumi
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: That reminds me, you need to come up with a name for our circle soon.

name: Watching a Live Concert Together, Megumi
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: I wish you two didn't provoke each other.

name: Sense of Rivalry, Eriri
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Game》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Game》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Oops! My pencil broke. Go buy me another right now, Tomoya.

name: Pulling an All-Nighter to Game
text: 【REST】 2 of your 《Game》 characters, and those characters cannot 【STAND】 during your next stand phase. If you 【REST】 2 characters, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, choose up to 1 《Game》 character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and put this card at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Megumi: "Sheesh, you're a pain in the butt."

name: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock) (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: I understand all too well that you're dead serious about wanting to make your dream come true.

name: Cost of Pulling an All-Nighter
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock) (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: I'm just gonna sleep for a while.

name: Being Serious in Creating Games
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: You're not used to all-nighters.

name: The Night Together, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock & Put this card into your memory] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Game》 or 《Novel》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Goodbye... Mr. Ethical.

name: Tale About Achieving a Dream, Megumi
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Our game is almost finished, isn't it?

name: Variety of Outfits, Megumi
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Game》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Game》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: Wow, you really livened up all of a sudden.

name: Pride of Creators, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《Game》 or 《Novel》 character, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 other character from your stage into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavorText: Welcome to the creator's world, Tomoya Aki.

name: Victory Through Persistence, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: You'll pay with your body, Mr. Ethical!

name: Vulgar Incitement, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", if you have 4 or more 《Game》 or 《Novel》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Ah, reminiscing over the many things that have happened today. You prefer to do that alone?

name: Beginning of a Long Night, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Choices During the Night Together" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose this card and 1 of your other characters, and those cards get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: W-Wait...

name: The Battle at Rokutenba Mall, Megumi
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory When this card attacks, if "Passed-By Date Event" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 level X or lower 《Game》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of cards in your memory.
flavorText: Roger!

name: blessing software, Utaha
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: "And leads him into a thicket and tries to act on her passion!"

name: First Autograph Event, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 When your other character becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When "Metronome in Love" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Game》 or 《Novel》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: That's "Senpai" to you, Kouhai.

name: Sharp Tongue Trope Senpai, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Game》 or 《Novel》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: That's why you have the guts to show your face to the girl you cast aside long ago, isn't it?

name: Critiquing the Proposal, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 "Tomoya's Proposal" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Game》 or 《Novel》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I can't join you in your spur-of-the-moment production house games.

name: Smug Decision, Tomoya
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Game》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When your opponent levels up, you may choose 1 "Choices During the Night Together" in your climax area, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: But that's the best part of the Gal-ge protagonist, Utaha-senpai!

name: Utako Kasumi's Editor, Sonoko
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +3000 power for each other 《Novel》 character in your center stage. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "The Peak of Confusion, Utaha" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText:
So I figured that if it was someone
you knew, it would help you relax.

name: Unconcealable Hostility, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Perhaps you could get to the point, Mr. Ethical?

name: Exposing Her Embarrassment, Megumi
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Game》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Game》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, if that card has in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: But I was not told to get naked!

name: The Peak of Confusion, Utaha
flavorText: Tomoya: "Was it really that big a question?"

name: The Morning Together, Utaha
text: 【CONT】 Memory If "The Night Together, Utaha" is in your memory, this card gets +2500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】 by the 【AUTO】 effects of your opponent's characters."
flavorText: I really had fun last night.

name: Training Camp With Everyone, Utaha
text: 【CONT】 Memory If your memory has 2 or more 《Game》 or 《Novel》 characters, this card gets +4000 power.
flavorText: Come now, that's your top recommendation, Sawamura? Isn't that a lame harem anime that was packed with panty shots and nudity right from episode 1?

name: Closing the Distance, Megumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Game》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Yeah, you're right. Eriri.

name: Fading Highlight
text: You may choose 1 card in your clock, and put it into your level. If you do, choose up to 3 characters in your waiting room, return them to your hand, choose up to 1 climax in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to 3 《Game》 characters in your waiting room, and put them into your stock in any order.
flavorText: I'll go practice myself.

name: Tomoya's Proposal
text: Choose up to 2 characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand.
flavorText: Trash to trash, rubbish to rubbish, ashes to ashes.

name: Choices During the Night Together
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Why do my feelings not reach you?!

name: Metronome in Love
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the effect. (: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as 【REST】)
flavorText: Tomoya: "I read the first volume more than 2- times."

name: Passed-By Date Event
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. ([: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand) (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Tomoya: "Just go die, normals!"

name: icy tail, Michiru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "icy tail" is in your climax area, put the bottom 4 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I'm just gonna have tons of fun now so that I can have all the great memories!

name: Unwavering Dream, Michiru
text: 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Game》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I have a dream of my own. My band.

name: Childhood Friends From Birth, Michiru
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Memories of a Faint Love" is in your climax area, choose up to 1 "icy tail, Michiru" in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Game》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: Well, you're not an otaku to me. You're just Tomo.

name: Live Costume, Michiru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck. 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "icy tail, Michiru" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Okay, we're gonna close with this next one.

name: Live Costume, Tokino
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you level up, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Please, Mitchi!

name: Training Camp With Everyone, Michiru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Game》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to that character's level ×500.
flavorText: Yes! I'm the champion! The juice is mine!

name: Cool Boy, Tomoya
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Nostalgic Memory, Michiru" get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Game》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Nostalgic Memory, Michiru", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Michiru: "And then Tomo showed up!"

name: icy tail, Ranko
text: 【CONT】 If your opponent has 2 or less characters in their center stage, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "icy tail, Michiru" in your hand] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: icy tail, Echika
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Resonate [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Reveal 1 "icy tail, Michiru" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "blessing software, Michiru" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Meaning that nobody will come just to see us, huh?

name: blessing software, Michiru
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less characters in your back stage, this card cannot attack. 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each other "blessing software, Michiru" in your center stage.
flavorText: I'll sing you a song for moral support!

name: Delightful Surprise, Michiru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that card at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: You got us a live set right off the bat?

name: Shocking Truth, Michiru
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: He's lying, right?

name: icy tail, Tokino
text: 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "icy tail, Michiru" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Bummer! That makes us the warm-up act!

name: Nostalgic Memory, Michiru
flavorText: Michiru: "I was seriously scared!"

name: Live Costume, Echika
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less characters in your back stage, this card cannot attack. 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack."
flavorText: We need you, Mitchi!

name: Promise Made at the Lake, Michiru
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is a higher level than this card, this card cannot frontal attack. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Knock what? Knock boots?

name: Live Costume, Ranko
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Let's do it, Mitchi!

name: The Truth of icy tail
text: 【COUNTER】 If you do not have a 《Music》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Music》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Tomoya: "They were all covers of anime songs!"

name: icy tail
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose a climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand) (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Michiru: "It's an original that I wrote, but I hope you like it. "Cherish You.""

name: Memories of a Faint Love
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. ([: When this card triggers, you may draw a card) (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: Michiru: "That was the only time you ever saw me cry!"

name: Nendoroid Plus, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Game》 characters, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: What are you doing, Tomoya?

name: Nendoroid Plus, Izumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 cost 1 or higher character in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on an open position of their back stage.
flavorText: Tomoya?

name: Nendoroid Plus, Megumi
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Game》 characters. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: Hi, Aki.

name: Nendoroid Plus, Utaha
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Game》 or 《Novel》 characters. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may 【REST】 this card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Good morning, Mr. Ethical.

name: Nendoroid Plus, Michiru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Game》 characters among those cards ×1000. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Well, if it isn't Tomo!

name: Flat Position, Megumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you reveal 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 《Game》 character from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may choose 1 "Ideal Girl, Megumi" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory.
flavorText: Sorry I'm late! I'm glad the weather turned out to be nice today.

name: Stealthy Classmate, Megumi
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText:
Looks like we're in
the same class again.

name: Closet Otaku, Eriri
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Uwa-!

name: Annoyed, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText:
I meant, why don't you track her down
and tell her how you feel?

name: At Loggerheads, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Game》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Wait, are you going to stay?

name: Main Heroine In-Charge, Megumi
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Face to Face With Destiny" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Game》 characters, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: I know everybody sees this, but it's kind of tough being an otaku, huh?

name: The Day It All Begins, Tomoya
flavorText: One spring day...

name: Moved to Tears, Tomoya
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Now do you see it, Kato?

name: Encouragement, Megumi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: So hang in there, Tomoya!

name: Staring Daggers, Eriri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Game》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText:
Megumi: "What are those people
outside the window, then?"

name: Illustration In-Charge, Eriri
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play "Backup" from their hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Game》 characters you have.
flavorText: If there were 48 hours in a day, I'd be making a 48 page offset print book...

name: Face to Face With Destiny
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Tomoya: "I came face to face with my destiny."

name: Super-Popular Illustrator, Eri Kashiwagi
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: Tomoya: "You are Eriri Spencer Sawamura, star of the Toyogasaki Academy Art Club."

name: Slope Where They First Met, Megumi
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "The Day It All Begins, Tomoya" get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/"The Day It All Begins, Tomoya" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "The Day It All Begins, Tomoya" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText:
Well, the first time we actually met was
at the entrance ceremony a year ago.

name: Fated Encounter? Megumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: I'm the what?

name: Irresponsible and Carefree Attitude, Megumi
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavorText:
But you're you, Aki, and all we're doing is
staying up all night playing a game.

name: Cold Stare, Utaha
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText:
Won't it cause problems later
if Toyogasaki students are here?

name: At Loggerheads, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Game》 or 《Novel》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText:
But I don't have anything
to talk to you about.

name: Bewilderment and Desolateness, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Game》 or 《Novel》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Why did you have to pick now, Tomoya?

name: Scenario Writing In-Charge, Utaha
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Game》 or 《Novel》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: I just want to live each day sleeping, reading and writing. There are other things I want to do but I can do those all while I sleep.

name: Waiting in Vain
text: Choose up to 2 characters in your waiting room, return them to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText:
Utaha: "We've been stood up."
Eriri: "Yeah."

name: High School Author, Utako Kasumi
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Tomoya: "You are the smartest student in the history of Toyogasaki Academy, Utaha Kasumigaoka!"
